    Class Adapter

    Base class for core rendering logic

    Inherits from

    • Object (base class)

    Properties

    Name Type Description
    backfaceCulling [get] bool
    deferredFrameBuffer [get] uint
    depthRenderTexture [get] uint
    deviceContext [get] void*
    diffuseRenderTexture [get] uint
    fullscreen [get] bool
    height [get] uint
    normalRenderTexture [get] uint
    renderContext [get] void*
    screenHeight [get] uint
    screenWidth [get] uint
    vsync [get] bool
    width [get] uint
    backfaceCulling [set] bool
    deferredFrameBuffer [set] uint
    depthRenderTexture [set] uint
    deviceContext [set] void*
    diffuseRenderTexture [set] uint
    fullscreen [set] bool
    height [set] uint
    normalRenderTexture [set] uint
    renderContext [set] void*
    screenHeight [set] uint

    width [set] uint

    Methods

    Name Description
    addUI
    beginDraw Sets up the render pipeline.
    closeWindow Closes the window
    endDraw Currently the entire rendering pass for the active Scene. TODO: Refactor the name
    initialize Initializes the Adapter, called in loading
    initializeDeferredRendering Initializes the FBO and Textures for deferred rendering
    messageLoop TODO
    openWindow Opens the window
    reload Reloads the Adapter without closing
    resize Resizes the window and updates FBOs
    shutdown Shuts down the Adapter
    swapBuffers Swaps the back buffer to the screen
    loadProperties Loads rendering properties from Config
